mapper.insert: insert into position(position_name, description, department_id, create_time, update_time) values(#{positionName}, #{description}, #{departmentId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update position
position_name = #{positionName},
description = #{description},
department_id = #{departmentId},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select p.*, p.position_name as positionName, p.create_time as createTime, p.update_time as updateTime, d.id as departmentId from position p left join department d on p.department_id = d.id where id = #{id}

select p.*, p.position_name as positionName, p.create_time as createTime, p.update_time as updateTime, d.id as departmentId from position p left join department d on p.department_id = d.id where p.position_name = #{positionName}
